name: Devil's in the details
description: Seven styles from user 168079, identical except for the background, and all defective in just the same way. (Evidently even Satan has trouble finding good help.) Corrected and collected here.
additional_info: And the Number of the Beast is Seven... style 79199 style 79198 style 79197 style 79196 style 79195 style 79200 style 79195 (oh, gosh, sorry Satan, blame user 168079, he's the one who lost count) Append .css to this page's URL, Goat, to collect the template, then select an option and click "Show code" to get the body properties for each. When yours are repaired, mine will come down.
